title: Junkyard
desc:
Rent:
Base: 2$
1 House: 5$
2 Houses: 8$
3 Houses: 10$
4 Houses: 20$

Houses Cost 30$ each.


Stop-In Effect: If you are the owner/if this property is not owned by anyone, you may dig around for spare parts. Roll a d6. If you roll a 1 + # of houses or less, you gain money equal to the rent of this property x the number of houses.
